string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS ( id INT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, program TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_date DATETIME, timestamp DATETIME NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (id) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FORMS_VALUE ( id INT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, form_id INT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, field_name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, value TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (form_id) REFERENCES FORMS(id) )
